'''''Trees and Dreams''''' is a [[World Quest]] that is automatically received available after completing [[The World of Aranara]]. After completing this quest, the [[Tree of Dreams]] is unlocked.

The quest has no dialogue and only serves to show the player where the Tree of Dreams is located.

==Steps==
# Go to the designated location

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|You feel the calling of some mysterious presence after talking to Araja.}}
